blueprint.label: Make All (WIP)
blueprint.description:
This design could use some improvement but the important parts are functional.  Some assemblers are defined but don't have all the necessary materials delivered to them simply because I managed to launch a rocket before they were needed.

Temporarily "upgrade" storage chests to wooden if needed.

If you have a better design, PLEASE SUBMIT IT!

Also a basic bot factory but needs hand-delivery of brains and batteries.
